verses.name: Nehemiah 12:1
verses.text: Now these are the priests and the Levites that went up with Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel, and Jeshua: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:7
verses.text: Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, Jedaiah. These were the chief of the priests and of their brethren in the days of Jeshua.

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:8
verses.text: Moreover the Levites: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, and Mattaniah, which was over the thanksgiving, he and his brethren.

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:9
verses.text: Also Bakbukiah and Unni, their brethren, were over against them in the watches.
